adjectives.description: nutmeggy (comparative more nutmeggy, superlative most nutmeggy)

entries.meaning: Resembling a nutmeg seed in taste or appearance.

examples: Sometimes that's the best we can manage, but to others we want to feel not like a postmodern, post-feminist, overstretched modern woman but, rather, a domestic goddess, trailing nutmeggy fumes of baking pie in our languorous wake.
